jol.types.operator
Class Join

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.operator.Operator
      jol.types.operator.Join
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Operator>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AntiScanJoin, IndexJoin, ScanJoin
public abstract class Join
extends Operator

The interface to all join operators.

Nested Class Summary
private  class Join.JoinFilter
          Evaluates a single join attribute.
private  class Join.TableField
          A table function used to extract values from tuples taken from a specific Table object.

            Predicate predicate,

Create a new join operator.

Parameters:
context - The runtime context.
predicate - The predicate representing the table being joined.
input - The schema of the input tuples that are to be joined with the (inner) table.

validate

protected java.lang.Boolean validate(Tuple outer,
                                     Tuple inner)
                              throws P2RuntimeException
Apply all join filters.

Parameters:
outer - Tuple from the outer relation.
inner - Tuple from the inner relation.
Returns:
true if all join filters succeed, false otherwise.
Throws:
P2RuntimeException

filters

private java.util.List<Join.JoinFilter> filters(Predicate predicate)
Create a list of join filters based on the predicate schema and the input tuple schema. A filter will be created for each variable that matches between these two schemas.

Parameters:
predicate - The predicate that references the inner table.
Returns:
A list of join filters.
